about_the_game:
Greetings, brave adventurer! Welcome to Croak Crusader: Champion of Canada, a fast-paced, momentum-based action platformer where precision, skill, and grit are your ultimate allies. When the Roachilla Empire (grotesque alien bio-experiments created by the sinister Professor Creature) threatens the Great White North, it’s up to the indomitable Captain Croak to swing into action and save the day. Armed with a versatile grapple and fueled by unrelenting determination, you’ll dash, leap, and battle through a gauntlet of explosive, white-knuckle challenges.

Explore a vibrant world of forgotten bomb factories, sprawling circuses, and shadowy jungle ruins, each teeming with traps and enemies that demand lightning-fast reflexes and razor-sharp precision. The gameplay is difficult but deeply rewarding, blending tight platforming mechanics with fluid momentum and thrilling combat. Every step forward is a test of your skill, every enemy encounter an opportunity for satisfying chaos.

With its stunning black-and-white visuals inspired by the golden age of cinema and the chaotic energy of Hollywood Z-movies, Croak Crusader isn’t just a game: it’s an unforgettable journey. Will you conquer the impossible and save the Land of the Maple Leaf, or will the Roachilla Empire prevail? The fate of Canada is in your hands.

content_descriptors.notes: Croak Crusader: The Champion of Canada features blood and gore particles produced from killing enemies. Similar stylistically to a Quentin Tarantino film.
